name: Bountiful Bloom: C0R1 A Thousand Floating Dreams
On-field: C0R1 Everlasting Moonglow
eval: if (!stats.NORMAL_FLAT_DMG) stats.NORMAL_FLAT_DMG = 0; stats.NORMAL_FLAT_DMG += 0.082 * (stats.BASE_HP * (1 + stats.HP_PERCENT) + stats.HP) + 0.15 * (stats.HEAL_ADD || 0); if (!stats.CHARGE_FLAT_DMG) stats.CHARGE_FLAT_DMG = 0; stats.CHARGE_FLAT_DMG += 0.115 * (stats.BASE_HP * (1 + stats.HP_PERCENT) + stats.HP) + 0.15 * (stats.HEAL_ADD || 0); if (!stats.SKILL_FLAT_DMG) stats.SKILL_FLAT_DMG = 0; stats.SKILL_FLAT_DMG += 0.121 * (stats.BASE_HP * (1 + stats.HP_PERCENT) + stats.HP)
